findings.title: Owner can update total buy and total sell fees with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The owner has the capability to modify total buy and total sell fees without any limitations.

findings.title: Fund address or owner can pause trading through wallet amount and transaction amount
findings.description: The fund address or owner has the capability to pause trading by modifying wallet amount and transaction amount, which could lead to unauthorized control over trading activities.

findings.title: Unchecked Call Return Value
findings.description: The return value of a message call is not checked. Execution will resume even if the called contract throws an exception.
